summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Faux Locs Crochet Hair 6 Packs 18 Inch Soft Locs Crochet Hair for Black Women Natural Faux Locs Crochet Braids Pre Looped Synthetic Distressed Locs Braiding Hair (1B#)
Review Date: 2020/11/17
Store: UHair
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'UHair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '13.9 x 8.6 x 3.2 inches; 1.2 Pounds'}
Review Text: You get a nice amount for the price point and they are decent looking. In my opinion they don't look as realistic as other faux locs I've seen.
Review Title: It will do
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: UV LED Nail Lamp 36w, Portable USB Gel Nail Dryer, Polish Nail Light for Home and Travel, White
Review Date: 2020/11/23
Store: KOCECER
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'KOCECER', 'Special Feature': 'Rechargeable', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Room Type': 'Usb', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Package Dimensions': '7.9 x 7.5 x 3.5 inches; 10.09 Ounces', 'UPC': '791555028525'}
Review Text: I dont even know how you rate something like this, I'm not a UV expert lol but I can say that it does what it's supposed to do. I'm not fancy with my nails I just use basic Sally gel nail polish and it cures it nicely and it helps it last longer in my opinion. Best part is the size, although for an adult you can only do one hand at a time, it isn't a bulky heavy machine. It is compact, stores away easily, and pretty enough looking to leave displayed by your vanity/pedi mani area. This is a great, even must have especially in these times where we aren't going anywhere. Great gift too
Review Title: Awesome
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: UV LED Nail Lamp – 128W Rapid-Curing Gel Nails Dryer for Manicures and Pedicures – Dual-Voltage with Extra-Long Cable, Multi-Language Manual – Professional Gel Lamp for Homes or Salons by OVLUX, Gold
Review Date: 2020/12/07
Store: OVLUX
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'OVLUX', 'Special Feature': 'Energy Efficient', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Connectivity Technology': 'USB', 'Package Dimensions': '9.4 x 8.3 x 4.3 inches; 1.55 Pounds', 'UPC': '765453999881'}
Review Text: Simple to use and has a few more options than other uv lamps on here. I like the size. Great for nails and curing other crafts that need to be cured.
Review Title: Must have
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Water Microdermabrasion Machine | Hydro Dermabrasion Facial Machine for Nose and Face Skin | Multi-Functional Hydra Facial Machine Professional Easy to Use.
Review Date: 2021/01/04
Store: wolltex
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '15.8 x 12.2 x 9.7 inches; 5.1 Pounds'}
Review Text: It's a little difficult to use in the sense that you can't use the exfoliation and other tool st the same time it has to be plugged in differently and I feel like it sort of defeats the purpose. My box didn't come with instructions so maybe I'm just doing it wrong but I mean thats also annoying. It's a lot bigger than I thought so if you don't have the ideal space for this or a small bathroom cabinet you're going to be limited on space.  Im going to keep trying it and seeing where it takes me so far I'm not seeing much of a difference but like I said I might be missing a step
Review Title: Lost
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Gel Nail Polish Set, Glitter 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use
Review Date: 2021/01/25
Store: Anzuo
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Number of Pieces': '6', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 3.15 x 3.54 inches; 10.23 Ounces'}
Review Text: Pretty colors but not as thick as I would hope. I'm not sure if I just got a bad batch but mine were a little watery & some were extra sticky.  But the ones I could use had a nice vibrant color.
Review Title: Nice color
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual's shopping history reveals a strong inclination towards beauty and self-care products, particularly in hair and nail care. Consistent ratings suggest a tendency to appreciate product functionality over aesthetic perfection, as seen in the mixed sentiments towards hair extensions that lacked realism but offered decent value for money. 

Common themes highlight a practical approach to beauty routines, with repeated purchases of nail lamps indicating a preference for at-home manicures and ease of use. The user shows a clear preference for compact and portable items, emphasizing convenience during their beauty regimen. Despite varied ratings, the focus remains on affordability and usability rather than luxury or extensive features, indicating moderate price sensitivity.

Recurring quality preferences emerge, such as the desire for products that are effective yet straightforward, like nail lamps and gel polishes. The mixed reviews about product thickness and ease of use suggest an expectation for quality but an understanding of occasional shortcomings. 

Overall, the buyer seeks reliable, budget-friendly beauty solutions that enhance convenience without requiring complex skills or substantial investment, favoring products that can be easily integrated into their daily routine.

target_interaction.title: BEAUTIFUL
target_interaction.text: these might have to be the prettiest makeup brushes and maybe overall beauty product I've ever seen lol. I'm not even a fan of "pretty" things like this, they don't catch my attention usually but these are truly gorgeous. They don't have a cheap plastic feel to them and the bristles are sooo soft. Get thes for your diva friends or even to display on your vanity if you're into that because they def stand out and will catch an eye.
target_interaction.title_meta: DOYIZZ Makeup Brushes Set, 10pcs Crystal Handle Makeup Brushes Powder Blush Brush Foundation Brush Blending Eye shadow Concealer Makeup Brush Set (Pink)
